title: Australian [colour] diary. No. 035. Port Moresby
brief_description: A day in the life of Port Moresby, the capital city of Papua New Guinea. Shows early morning arrivals of fish, fruit and vegetables at the market, the flow of traffic into the city centre, the modern office buildings, indigenous buildings and artifacts, and finally people leaving work and relaxing on the beach.
